title: Mahanayakas bless new Premier
body_lines: The Chief Prelates of Malwatta and Asgiriya Chapters have telephoned and blessed the new Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe.

Most Venerable Thibbatuwawe Sri Siddhartha Sumangala Thero - Maha Nayake of the Malwathu Chapter, Most Venerable Warakagoda Sri Gnanarathna Thero - Maha Nayake of the Asgiri Chapter have called the Prime Minister and blessed him.
